item.title: 英国住房开发商缩减项目规模，因为高层住宅项目延期
item.description: 2021 年，Greystar Real Estate Partners 在伦敦巴特西区购买了一块价值 3100 万英镑（4140 万美元）的土地，目的是建造一座可俯瞰泰晤士河、拥有约 300 户的出租公寓楼。这家美国私募股权公司于去年年底向监管机构提交了计划，渴望破土动工。但 40 多周过去了，它仍在等待决定。【原文：In 2021, Greystar Real Estate Partners bought a £31 million ($41.4 million) plot of land in London’s Battersea district with the aim of building a roughly 300-home rental tower overlooking the River Thames. The US private equity firm submitted plans to regulators at the end of last year, keen to break ground. But more than 40 weeks later, it’s still awaiting a decision.】

item.title: 南非将降低利率，关税细节尚待确定
item.description: 在美国征收更严厉的贸易关税前夕，南非储备银行准备延长其自2019年以来最长的宽松周期，这很可能会拖累南非本已疲软的经济增长。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank is poised to extend its longest easing cycle since 2019 on the eve of stiffer US trade tariffs, which are likely to weigh on the country’s already sluggish economic growth.】

item.title: 印尼盾创一个月来最弱，印尼央行出手干预
item.description: 在美联储的鹰派基调使美元汇率一夜之间飙升至两个月高点后，印尼央行对外汇市场进行了干预，以稳定印尼盾。【原文：The Indonesian central bank intervened in foreign-exchange markets to stabilize the rupiah after the Federal Reserve’s hawkish tone sent the dollar surging to a two-month high overnight.】

item.title: 特朗普与安瓦尔通话后，马来西亚将公布美国贸易协议
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统与马来西亚总统安瓦尔-易卜拉欣通电话后，马来西亚将宣布与美国达成一项贸易协议。【原文：Malaysia is set to announce a trade deal with the US after President Donald Trump and his Malaysian counterpart Anwar Ibrahim spoke by telephone.】

item.title: 戴蒙与特朗普复谈经济与美联储利率
item.description: 杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）几个月来一直通过电视热门话题和社交媒体上的帖子互相交流，现在他们终于可以当面交流了。【原文：After months of speaking to each other through TV hits and social media posts, Jamie Dimon and Donald Trump are catching up in person.】

item.title: 美国因伊朗石油贸易制裁又一中国码头
item.description: 美国已经制裁了第四个中国石油码头，这是与伊朗能源贸易有关的新一轮惩罚措施的一部分，华盛顿称伊朗为恐怖活动提供资金。【原文：The US has sanctioned a fourth Chinese oil terminal as part of a new wave of penalties relating to the trade of Iranian energy, which Washington says funds terrorist activities.】

item.title: 印度炼油企业受到美国和欧盟反俄压力的挤压
item.description: 由于美国和欧盟加大了针对俄罗斯能源流动的力度，印度的炼油商们正陷入困境，加工商们争先恐后地从其他来源购买原油。【原文：Indian oil refiners are being hemmed in by both the US and European Union’s stepped-up efforts to target Russian energy flows, with processors scrambling to buy crude from other sources.】

item.title: 阿达尼愿意在越南投资 100 亿美元以推动全球发展
item.description: 印度大亨高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）愿意在越南投资 100 亿美元，在美国正在进行的贿赂调查削弱了他从港口到电力企业集团的全球雄心之后，他正在亚洲寻找新的增长机会。【原文：Gautam Adani is willing to invest $10 billion in Vietnam, as the Indian tycoon seeks new growth opportunities in Asia after an ongoing bribery probe in the US tempered his ports-to-power conglomerate’s global ambitions.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率不变，贸易协议达成后价格观点有所提升
item.description: 日本央行维持基准利率稳定，并超预期上调了通胀预期，这表明日本央行可能更接近加息，同时继续警告称，日本央行仍在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税的影响。【原文：The Bank of Japan held its benchmark interest rate steady and raised its inflation outlook more than expected in a sign it may be closer to a rate hike, while continuing to warn that it’s still assessing the impact of President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: OpenAI-Challenger Manus 准备对主代理平台进行重大升级
item.description: 由中国人创办的初创公司Manus正在推出一项功能，通过将任务分配给数十个协同工作的人工智能代理来进行广泛的研究，这可能是自今年3月推出其标志性人工智能平台以来最大的一次更新。【原文：Chinese-founded startup Manus is rolling out a feature that allows broad research by assigning tasks to scores of AI agents working in tandem, in potentially the biggest update since launching its signature artificial intelligence platform in March.】

item.title: 美元反弹后，中国人民银行通过定盘价稳定人民币汇率
item.description: 在人民币汇率因美元飙升而跌至两个月低点后，中国央行通过每日参考汇率出手稳定人民币汇率。【原文：China’s central bank stepped in to stabilize the yuan with its daily reference rate, after the currency dropped to a two-month low in response to the dollar’s surge.】

item.title: 中国称与美国在瑞典举行的贸易谈判加深了互信
item.description: 中国共产党官方报纸称，中美谈判代表本周在瑞典举行的贸易谈判加强了双方之间的信任，增强了通过讨论解决经济争端的信心。【原文：Trade talks between Chinese and US negotiators this week in Sweden have strengthened trust between the two sides and boosted confidence in resolving economic disputes via discussions, the Communist Party’s official newspaper said.】

item.title: 特朗普向印度开征 25% 关税，熊市开始回暖
item.description: (彭博社）— 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：(Bloomberg) — Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 泰国首富认为 100 亿美元的水电和液化天然气项目将推动增长
item.description: 泰国首富萨拉特-拉塔纳瓦迪（Sarath Ratanavadi）预计，在邻国老挝的水电项目和一个新的国内液化天然气终端的 100 亿美元投资将推动其商业帝国的增长。【原文：Thailand’s richest person, Sarath Ratanavadi, expects $10 billion investments in hydropower projects in neighboring Laos and a new domestic liquefied natural gas terminal to drive his business empire’s growth.】

item.title: 市场对特朗普对印度加征 25% 关税威胁的反应
item.description: 华盛顿特区-6月26日：2017年6月26日，华盛顿特区，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪在白宫玫瑰园发表联合声明时拥抱在一起。特朗普和莫迪今天早些时候在椭圆形办公室举行会晤，讨论了一系列双边问题。(摄影：马克-威尔逊/盖蒂图片社）【原文：WASHINGTON, DC - JUNE 26: U.S. President Donald Trump and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi embrace while delivering joint statements in the Rose Garden of the White House June 26, 2017 in Washington, DC. Trump and Modi met earlier today in the Oval Office to discuss a range of bilateral issues. (Photo by Mark Wilson/Getty Images)】

item.title: 卢特尼克称美国与泰国和柬埔寨达成贸易协议
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，美国已与柬埔寨和泰国达成贸易协议。几天前，这两个东南亚邻国在唐纳德-特朗普总统的敦促下同意停火，以结束在两国有争议的边境地区发生的致命冲突。【原文：The US has reached trade agreements with Cambodia and Thailand, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said, days after the Southeast Asian neighbors agreed to a ceasefire at President Donald Trump’s urging to end deadly clashes along their disputed border.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 6 月零售销售额飙升 1.2%，标志着最终报告出炉
item.description: 澳大利亚零售销售的最终读数高于预期，这与近期支持储备银行最早于下月降息的数据背道而驰。【原文：Australian retail sales came in stronger than forecast in the final reading of the series, running counter to recent data that’s supported the Reserve Bank cutting interest rates as early as next month.】

item.title: 贸易不振，中国工厂活动意外恶化
item.description: 尽管与美国达成了关税休战协议，但由于早期迹象显示出口正在放缓，国内需求持续疲软，7 月份中国工厂活动意外恶化，创六个月新低。【原文：China’s factory activity unexpectedly deteriorated in July to a six-month low despite a tariff truce with the US, as early signs emerge exports are slowing and weak domestic demand persists.】

item.title: 激进分子 Ancora 是铁路运营商 CSX 的 "成长型 "股东
item.description: 激进投资者 Ancora 控股集团是铁路运营商 CSX 公司的 "成长型股东"，而此时该行业正准备进一步整合。【原文：Activist investor Ancora Holdings Group is a “growing shareholder” in rail operator CSX Corp., at a time when the industry is bracing for further consolidation.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁加深 2,480 亿美元的印度股市暴跌
item.description: 在印度对美国的出口被征收亚洲最高的关税之后，印度摇摇欲坠的股票市场面临着更多损失的风险。【原文：India’s faltering equities market faces the risk of more losses after the nation was slapped with one of the highest tariff rates in Asia on its exports to the US.】

item.title: 大阪交易所将增加做市商的单一股票期权
item.description: 大阪交易所（Osaka Exchange Inc.【原文：Osaka Exchange Inc. plans to expand its market making program for single stock options amid efforts to increase derivatives trading in Japan.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长豪瑟称 CPI "非常受欢迎"，就业市场仍受争议
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）表示，澳大利亚本周的季度通胀结果接近储备银行的预期，同时他补充说，储备银行正在讨论劳动力市场的紧张程度。【原文：Australia’s quarterly inflation outcome this week was close to the Reserve Bank’s expectations, Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser said, while adding the board is debating the extent of labor market tightness.】

item.title: 谁最有可能受到特朗普 25% 印度关税和惩罚的影响
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普从8月1日起对印度出口商品征收25%的关税，预计将对一系列行业造成损害，包括电子产品和非专利药品制造商、珠宝和汽车零部件公司。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s 25% tariff on Indian exports from Aug. 1 is expected to hurt a spate of sectors — from makers of electronics and generic drugs to jewelry and auto component firms.】

item.title: 百威啤酒亚太区利润不及预期，中国经济放缓对其造成影响
item.description: 百威啤酒亚太有限公司（Budweiser Brewing Co APAC Ltd. ）第二季度利润低于预期，原因是中国消费持续疲软，啤酒消费量继续下降。【原文：Budweiser Brewing Co APAC Ltd.’s second-quarter profit fell short of expectations, as beer consumption in China continued to decline as the country sees persistent consumer weakness.】

item.title: 与美国达成 15%关税协议后韩国股市和韩元反弹
item.description: 在亚洲国家与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成贸易协议，对韩国出口美国的商品征收 15%的关税后，韩国股市走高。韩元兑美元汇率攀升。【原文：South Korean equities advanced after the Asian nation clinched a trade deal with President Donald Trump that would impose a 15% tariff on its exports to the US. The won climbed against the dollar.】

item.title: 特朗普在巴西关税问题上闪烁其词，卢拉的反抗得到了回报
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）50%关税威胁的挑衅性回应在周三得到了验证—；至少在短期内是这样—；市场和企业对一长串关税豁免名单集体松了一口气。【原文：Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s defiant response to Donald Trump’s 50% tariff threat was validated Wednesday — at least in the short term — with markets and businesses breathing a collective sigh of relief at the long list of exemptions to the levies.】

item.title: 特朗普关税将精炼金属排除在外后伦敦铜价上涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布美国对精炼金属免征进口关税，令市场感到震惊，此后伦敦铜价走高。【原文：Copper edged higher in London after President Donald Trump shocked the market by exempting refined metal from US import tariffs.】

item.title: 日本工厂产出增长显示企业在关税影响下的韧性
item.description: 日本 6 月份的工厂产出出人意料地增长，因为即使美国的关税对日本的出口造成了压力，制造商们仍然表现出了韧性。【原文：Japan’s factory output unexpectedly rose in June, as manufacturers showed resilience even as US tariffs weigh on the nation’s exports.】

item.title: 关税担忧加剧，台币远期汇率将回落
item.description: 由于贸易紧张局势加剧说服海外投资者削减对岛内股票的购买，对冲需求减少，一种受欢迎的台币衍生品开始回吐近期的部分涨幅。【原文：A popular Taiwan dollar derivative is starting to unwind some of its recent gains as rising trade tensions convince overseas investors to cut purchases of the island’s stocks and reduce demand for hedging.】

item.title: 三星芯片部门大幅亏损，显示危机扩大
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）半导体部门报告的利润远低于预期，反映出这家全球最大的存储芯片制造商的危机正在加深。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s semiconductor division reported profit that fell far short of expectations, reflecting a deepening crisis at the world’s largest memory chipmaker.】
